name: Alone in the Dark
summary:
Timmy Was Alone in the Dark. He heard a noise from his closet. He hid under the covers but was still sucked through the closet door to the Dark beyond.
Whatever You do... Don't Kill Timmy.

Guide Timmy ( Our 5yr old Hero ) through the cavernous Dark... Out of the Abyss, through Limbo, past the lightning flashes in the night sky back to the safety of his Dark bedroom. Armed with only a toy photon ray gun, Timmy must battle killer robots, outrun the Giant Spider Bot of Death and avoid over exposure to an ominous light.
Puzzle sections guarantee You Will Die & Retry before You make it safely home.
